main event: Three lights were observed flying in trail formation in Scranton, Pennsylvania on September 22, 1958.
interesting points: The lights were round and small, traveled swiftly and silently, The lights made occasional abrupt turns, After about 5 minutes, they were lost to sight when they went behind clouds., The object was pale white in color and oblong in shape and appeared much larger than a normal aircraft., Witnesses reported that the object made no noise and had no visible lights.
sighted object: three round lights in the sky
